org.pepstock.charba.client.items

Class SizeItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.GenericJavaScriptObject
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.items.BaseItem
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.items.SizeItem

  • public final class SizeItem
extends BaseItem
    This item contains the new size of the chart after it has been resized.
    This object has been created ONLY when a resize event occurs.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
    See Also:
    ChartResizeEvent, ChartResizeEventHandler

      Needed for GWt injection

      double getHeight()
      Returns the height of the chart item in pixel.

      Returns the width of the chart item in pixel.
